entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Prince Edward (Picton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:09 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 04:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 60 %
Dewpoint: -5.9°C
Wind: WSW 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Overcast. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Overcast. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning near noon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High zero. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
